name: root
description: Custom Ollama UI Electron app based on Vite + Tailwind

scripts.compile: npm run build && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.mjs
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run compile && cd e2e && tsc && npx playwright test ./dist/**/*.spec.js
scripts.create-renderer: cd packages && npm create vite@latest renderer
scripts.init: npm run create-renderer && npm run integrate-renderer && npm install
